pages.title: The Syncbook
pages.text: The Syncbook is a item that allows you to share your spectrum progress with others.$(br)Use it to fill it with knowledge.

pages.title: But how do I use this
pages.text: The Syncbook will $(item)glow$() when it is holding spectrum progress. simply right-click to get the progress.$(br)Or if you want to overwrite the progress in the book you can $(item)Sneak and use$() to put your progress in the book
